metadata.name: Tiny Dancer
metadata.description:
The commissary flooded with bold midday sun filling the shadows with a silent music.

Marionettes and Other Ghosts of Vision explores the persona of imagination celebrating the genius of collaboration between Self and Subject. Photographed in spring of 2013, Tiny Dancer is one image in a series of twenty individual character portraits envisioned as if in a Noirish scene in the various rooms of the abandoned Linda Vista Community Hospital. The story hints at what role these souls might have played in this space, the ghosts of this seemingly haunted, former Railroad employee hospital (rumored psyche ward) who are now forever lost in the palpable spirit of this abandoned place.

Location  
Linda Vista Community Hospital, Los Angeles, CA

Date of Capture: March 24, 2013  
NFT Edition

License  
Extended Editorial: NFT can be displayed privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. The license includes unlimited use and display in virtual or physical galleries, documentaries, and essays by the NFT holder.
